revised_title: Mismatch Repair and its Role in DNA Replication and Recombination
tldr: This article discusses the role of mismatch repair in maintaining genome stability and its connection to genetic disorders, including hereditary non-polyposis colon cancer (hnpcc) and other neurological and neuromuscular diseases. The authors explain how mismatch repair deficiency can lead to multiple phenotypes and predict further links between this deficiency and human genetic disorders.
